general_advisory: Keep rain water in the main rice field by bunding for timely puddling and transplanting. Cover the vegetable nursery with polythene to protect it from heavy rain and make drainage arrangement. In early planted maize and Jute apply nitrogen fertilizer after receding of rain. Make provisions for drainage, where kharif maize or pulses etc. have been sown. If the Sugarcane crop is 4-5 months old than wrapping and propping should be done for medium and long duration varieties to keeps the cane erects.
